channel.title: PHP on Reusing the wheel
channel.description: Recent content in PHP on Reusing the wheel

item.title: A PHP/Symfony blog engine
item.description: A few months ago I started a blog engine project based on Symfony framework. I’ve been adding things and making changes to it from time to time. Since August, I took a longer break in its development because I wanted to focus on other things, but now I’m returning to the project.
